item.description:
Join us at Lyman's Orchard in Middlefield for a fun day in the country. Along with beautiful scenery, Lyman's offers apple picking, a challenging corn maze (for all ages!), and a great farm store called the Apple Barrel, where you'll find Connecticut's best apple pie. The barbeque will be going on the deck while inside the store you'll find produce, a bakery, a deli, cheeses and more!. If you haven't picked up a pumpkin yet this year, you can get it here! A great way to enjoy the fall!

Let's meet by the front door of the Apple Barrel at 11:30 am. click here to get directions:

http://www.lymanorcha...
item.name: A Day in the Country
